summary: Extend the offline-ready Hindi-only Dwarka Yatra Guide PWA to be business-ready and installable: add an in-app ‚ÄúInstall App for Offline Use‚Äù prompt (Add to Home Screen), and add monetization UI in the Connectivity/Transport tab with a highlighted Rent a Car/Bike section and WhatsApp booking link, while ensuring peacock-feather header icon, correct Bhadkeshwar spelling, and unique Day 3 itinerary logic.
architectural_notes: Offline-first: use only local/hardcoded data; no external API/network calls.
Ensure app works instantly on launch and avoids runtime/network-related errors ("no canister errors").
App language must be strictly Hindi across all UI and content.
All guide content remains offline/local, but allow external deep links to Google Maps for "üìç Map" actions (no in-app map API required).
Remove/avoid displaying specific prices; use descriptive text like "Rates Available on spot" where applicable.
Rules/Warnings content must reflect the updated prohibited items list (offline/local content), shown in Hindi.
Support PWA installability (web app manifest + service worker) while preserving offline-first behavior (no required network calls for core content).
Allow external deep links for business actions (e.g., WhatsApp ‚ÄúBook Now‚Äù) similar to Google Maps links; no in-app WhatsApp SDK required.
When adding a placeholder shop image, avoid external network dependencies; prefer a bundled local asset or data-URI placeholder to preserve offline-first behavior.

Decision: For the Day 3 highlighted ‚ÄúSanskruti Novelty‚Äù recommendation, replace the current shop card UI with the provided <Card> + <Badge (Recommended)> structure (not merge). Ensure the image source remains offline-first (use bundled/local placeholder asset instead of the Imgur URL).
known_issues: Bug: Selecting "‡§¶‡§ø‡§® 3" currently shows the same itinerary as "‡§¶‡§ø‡§® 1" (Day 3 logic not applied).
Potential offline-first conflict: using a remote/generic placeholder image URL may trigger a network request; ensure placeholder is local/bundled or cached by service worker.
Day 3 itinerary route sequence/content is out of date vs the requested exact order (needs Harsad -> Visavada -> Porbandar + ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs Next?‚Äù card).

existing_features.title: Create a modern single-page app shell with a fixed bottom tab bar containing exactly 4 tabs: ‚ÄúYatra Plan‚Äù, ‚ÄúConnectivity‚Äù, ‚ÄúStay & Food‚Äù, and ‚ÄúRules & Timings‚Äù. Switching tabs must not trigger any network/API/canister calls and must work fully offline.

Implement the ‚ÄúYatra Plan‚Äù tab with a Days selector (1, 2, 3) and render the matching hardcoded itinerary. Use only local/hardcoded data. Display the plan as a clear ordered timeline/list with times/notes where provided.
Implement the ‚ÄúConnectivity‚Äù tab as a clean static table (no API calls) showing three sections: Trains, Luxury Buses, and Local Transport, using the provided entries and pricing exactly as given.
Implement the ‚ÄúStay & Food‚Äù tab using hardcoded categorized lists: Dharamshala (Budget) with approximate price range, Hotels (Mid-Range), Luxury, and Best Food, using the provided items exactly.
Implement the ‚ÄúRules & Timings‚Äù tab with the provided temple timings and a critical notice highlighted in red. Use only local/hardcoded data and display the banned-items warning verbatim.

Apply the app branding and layout polish: set the app title to ‚ÄúUltimate Dwarka Yatra Guide‚Äù with branding for ‚ÄúThe Desi Musafir‚Äù, use a Saffron (Orange) and Blue theme consistently across tabs, and add a footer on all tabs reading ‚ÄúPlanned by @the_desi.musafir‚Äù that links to the Instagram profile.

Ensure the app has ‚ÄúNO Canister Errors‚Äù by not requiring any backend/canister interactions for core functionality: all guide content must be bundled in the frontend as local data and the UI must not fail if the backend is unavailable.

Convert the app‚Äôs navigation and all visible guide content to Hindi, including the 4 bottom tab labels: ‚Äú‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‚Äù, ‚Äú‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡•á‡§Ç‚Äù, ‚Äú‡§π‡•ã‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‚Äù, and ‚Äú‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø‚Äù.

Update the header branding text to Hindi while preserving the creator attribution, so the app title is in Hindi (e.g., ‚Äú‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ó‡§æ‡§á‡§°‚Äù) and the ‚Äúby The Desi Musafir‚Äù line remains present.
Replace the Yatra Plan data and UI strings with the provided Hindi 1/2/3-day logic, using only local/hardcoded data, and show a Hindi day selector for ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® (1, 2, 3).

Add a clickable ‚Äúüìç Map‚Äù link next to every location name in the Yatra Plan itinerary that opens Google Maps in a new tab/window for that location (using a URL-based Maps search; no Maps SDK, no API keys).
Update the Connectivity tab to Hindi using the provided lists and remove all pricing from local transport; present Trains, Luxury Buses, and Local Transport as static Hindi sections with no prices.
Update the Stay & Food tab to Hindi using the provided lists, expand the options to include all provided entries, and remove any explicit prices or price ranges from the UI and local data.
Update the Rules tab to Hindi with the provided temple timings and show the provided red warning text verbatim in Hindi; ensure any additional guideline text on the screen is also in Hindi.

Replace the Hindi place name text "‡§≠‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞" with the exact string "‡§≠‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ (Bhadkeshwar)" everywhere it appears in the app‚Äôs bundled guide content and UI (including the Yatra Plan itinerary place names).

Update the top header icon in the global layout by replacing the current Om (‡•ê/üïâÔ∏è) symbol with a peacock feather icon (ü™∂) or another Krishna/Dwarkadhish-related symbol; use ü™∂ as the default replacement.

Fix the Day 3 selection bug in the Yatra Plan tab so that selecting "3 days" does not show the Day 1 plan and instead shows the correct Day 3 itinerary content. Update the Day 3 itinerary to match: Morning: "üìç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ (Rukmini Devi Mandir)"; Afternoon: "üìç ‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ (‡§∏‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞) OR ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ"; Evening: "‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä (Shopping)".

Update the Rules tab warning content to include an explicit prohibited-items list under a "Strictly Prohibited" heading, with these items: "‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§´‡•ã‡§® (Mobile Phones)", "‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§µ‡•â‡§ö (Smart Watches)", "‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§´‡•ã‡§® / ‡§á‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•â‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏ (Electronics)", "‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§¨‡•Ä (Car Remote Keys)", "‡§∏‡§ø‡§ó‡§∞‡•á‡§ü, ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡§∞, ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ö‡§ø‡§∏ (Tobacco/Lighter)".

Make the app installable as a PWA and add an in-app install prompt UI. Add a bottom-positioned, prominent prompt/button that appears when installation is available, with the exact button text: "üì≤ Install App for Offline Use" and short guidance telling the user to "Add to Home Screen" (including an iOS-friendly instruction path when the install event is not available). The install prompt must be dismissible and must not block core navigation.

In the "Connectivity/Transport" tab, add a monetization-focused "Rent a Car/Bike" section that visually stands out with a gold border. Include the exact text: "For Best Rates & Trusted Service - Contact Desi Musafir" and a primary CTA button labeled exactly "Book Now (WhatsApp)" that opens WhatsApp in a new tab/window to the owner phone number.

Update the local Day 2 itinerary data to insert a new step immediately after the existing ‚ÄúCross Sudarshan Setu / ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡•á‡§§‡•Å‚Äù step: place text must be exactly ‚Äúüìç ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® (Beyt Dwarka Temple Darshan)‚Äù and it must include an important note/description exactly ‚Äú‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§™‡§π‡§∞ 1:00 ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§∏‡•á 3:00 ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§‚Äù including the timing context ‚Äú(Timings: 9 AM - 1 PM & 3 PM - 6 PM)‚Äù as part of the same step‚Äôs note.

Reorder the local Day 3 itinerary flow so the sequence is reversed to match: Morning‚Äî‚Äúüìç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä (Dwarka Market Shopping)‚Äù; Afternoon‚Äî‚Äúüìç ‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® (Travel to Porbandar - Kirti Mandir & Sudama Mandir)‚Äù; Evening‚Äî‚Äú‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ (Return/Relax)‚Äù. Remove/replace any conflicting older Day 3 items so the displayed Day 3 timeline reflects this exact order and text.

Add a special highlighted recommendation card inside the Day 3 ‚ÄúShopping‚Äù section (i.e., rendered within the Shopping timeline item content) with these exact texts: Title ‚Äúüì∏ ‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ 3D ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã (Recommended)‚Äù; Shop Name ‚Äú‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•â‡§µ‡•á‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä (‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§Æ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§∞)‚Äù; Location ‚Äú‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•â‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§°‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ (Walking Distance from Temple).‚Äù; Details ‚Äú‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ 3D ‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡•Ä (‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§¨ ‡§¶‡§æ‡§Æ) ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π‡•§‚Äù The card must be visually distinct from normal text (highlighted styling).
Within the highlighted ‚ÄúSanskruti Novelty‚Äù recommendation card, include a placeholder image area that uses a generic placeholder URL (not yet a real shop photo) so the layout is correct.

Update the Day 3 itinerary data for the "3 Days" plan to match the exact new route sequence and time ranges provided by the user (including the Harsad -> Visavada stop order), and remove/replace any conflicting older Day 3 items so only the new sequence is shown when 3 days is selected.
Keep Google Maps deep links active for all Day 3 location items, and ensure the "What's Next?" item does not render a Google Maps link (since it is not a place).

Update the Day 3 highlighted shop card content to match the user‚Äôs new text, keep the placeholder image slot visible, and ensure the placeholder image works offline (use a bundled local asset rather than a remote placeholder URL).

Replace the existing Day 3 highlighted recommendation card rendering in the Yatra Plan tab with the exact Card + Badge structure provided by the user, including: (1) a Card component that accepts image, title, subtitle, and description; (2) a Badge displayed in the top-right with orange styling and a camera icon; (3) the Badge text set to "Recommended" exactly.

Ensure the replaced Card image source remains offline-safe by using the existing bundled local placeholder image path from the recommendation card data (recommendationCard.placeholderImage) rather than a remote URL, while keeping the component API compatible with the provided snippet (i.e., still using an "image" prop).

Update the Day 3 itinerary recommendation card UI so the ‚Äú‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ 3D ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã (Recommended)‚Äù / Sanskruti Novelty card renders with NO image (no , no image container, and no placeholder area). The card must display text-only while keeping the existing ‚ÄúRecommended‚Äù badge.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hindi-only 4-tab bottom navigation app shell with tab labels: ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§®, ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§π‡•ã‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§®, ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø (modern UI)
‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§® tab: ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® (1/2/3) selector shows the provided Hindi itinerary, and each location has a clickable "üìç Map" link opening Google Maps

‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡•á‡§Ç tab: static Hindi sections for Trains (‡§µ‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§, ‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤, ‡§ì‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∏), Luxury Buses (‡§™‡§ü‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏, ‡§à‡§ó‡§≤ ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§≤‡•ç‡§∏, GSRTC), and Local Transport (no prices; rates on spot)

‡§π‡•ã‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® tab: hardcoded Hindi categorized lists for Dharamshala (budget), Mid-Range Hotels, Luxury Hotels, and Best Food places; remove specific prices and include extensive options provided
Branding/polish: consistent Saffron (Bhagwa) & Blue theme, and footer on all tabs "Planned by @the_desi.musafir" linking to Instagram
Global text update: replace "‡§≠‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞" with "‡§≠‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ (Bhadkeshwar)" everywhere in the app
Header branding update: replace the top header "‡•ê" icon with a Peacock Feather (ü™∂) or Krishna/Dwarkadhish-related symbol

Fix Day 3 itinerary logic: ensure selecting ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® 3 shows Day 3 plan (Morning: ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞; Afternoon: ‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ (‡§∏‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞) OR ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ; Evening: ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä) instead of duplicating Day 1

PWA/installability: add an in-app ‚Äúüì≤ Install App for Offline Use‚Äù prompt/button (Add to Home Screen) and ensure the app is installable like a native app (manifest + service worker) while remaining offline-first

Business/monetization (Connectivity tab): make ‚ÄúRent a Car/Bike‚Äù section stand out with a gold border, add text ‚ÄúFor Best Rates & Trusted Service - Contact Desi Musafir‚Äù, and add a ‚ÄúBook Now (WhatsApp)‚Äù button linking to the user‚Äôs WhatsApp number

Update Day 2 itinerary: after ‚ÄúCross Sudarshan Setu‚Äù, add step ‚Äúüìç ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® (Beyt Dwarka Temple Darshan)‚Äù with note ‚Äú‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§™‡§π‡§∞ 1:00 ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§∏‡•á 3:00 ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (Timings: 9 AM - 1 PM & 3 PM - 6 PM)‚Äù

Refactor Day 3 (‡§¶‡§ø‡§® 3) itinerary data/logic to this exact sequence with times and map links: Morning 9‚Äì11 Dwarka Market & Shopping + highlighted Sanskruti Novelty card; Afternoon 12‚Äì3 depart for Porbandar with stops in order Harsad (Harshiddhi Mata Mandir) then Visavada (Mool Dwarka); Evening 4‚Äì7 reach Porbandar and visit Kirti Mandir & Sudama Mandir; Night show a ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs Next?‚Äù card with Option A Somnath/Diw, Option B Return Home

Day 3 highlighted ‚Äú‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ 3D ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã (Recommended)‚Äù / Sanskruti Novelty card: remove the image/placeholder completely and render text-only with Title ‚Äú‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•â‡§µ‡•á‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä (‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§Æ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§∞)‚Äù, Subtitle ‚Äúüìç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•â‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§°‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‚Äù, Description ‚Äú‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•â‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§°‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ - ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§î‡§∞ 3D ‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•§‚Äù
